PeriodUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Emitted when the epoch period is updated.

updatePeriod().details: Needle position is used to determine the distribution ratio between         the first and second recipient.         1...first recipient amount..|..second recipient amount..100 [%]                                     ^                                   needle

MAXIMUM_GAUGE_SCALE().notice: The maximum value of the gauge needle.

MINIMUM_GAUGE_SCALE().notice: The minimum value of the gauge needle.

activePeriod().notice: Start time of currently active epoch.

needle().notice: The current position of the gauge needle.

nudge().notice: Moves the gauge needle by 1 tick per epoch.

updatePeriod().notice: Updates the period of the current epoch. This function can be called         by anyone. Chain fees accumulate in this contract continuously and         can be distributed between the first and second recipient after         the end of the specified period. In other words, the release of         the accumulated fees must wait until the end of the period.

voter().notice: The address of the Voter contract.

userdoc.notice: A ChainFeeSplitter contract that changes the fee distribution between         veBTC holders and Stake Gauges based on the gauge needle position.
